summary: a total of 24,117 cases of incident RA (mean age 54.7 years, 18,688 [77.5%] women were analyzed. ambient respiratory viral infections in the population were associated with a higher number of incident RA over time, and its effect peaked 6 or 7 weeks after exposure. heumatoid arthritis trends according to sex in 2012 and 2013. weekly detection rate of eight respiratory viruses over 8 lag weeks.
